title: [The lyf of our lady]
author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
notes: Title taken from leaf 94v: Here endeth the book of the lyf of our lady.
Printer's name from colophon; place and date of publication from STC.
[par.]1 begins: tHis book was compyled by dan Iohn lydgate monke of burye ..
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
